channel.title: Npc's Dropping a Certain Amount of Items?
channel.description: Well, i'm trying to make it so an NPC can drop about 1000 tokkul, but i don't know where to start, i've tried this [code]public static int jad[] = {6570,6570,6570,6529x1000,6570,6570,6570,6570};[/code] But i ended up getting 100 errors, how else would i go about doing this?

item.title: Npc's Dropping a Certain Amount of Items?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Well, i’m trying to make it so an NPC can drop about 1000 tokkul, but i don’t know where to start, i’ve tried this

public static int jad[] = {6570,6570,6570,6529x1000,6570,6570,6570,6570};

But i ended up getting 100 errors, how else would i go about doing this?

Read full topic
item.source: Npc's Dropping a Certain Amount of Items?
